name: Rolling Hero - Road Of Sky
description:
A challenging and interesting game where traps and barriers make you addicted.

Rolling Hero is a game that pushes the boundaries of your speed and reaction. The splendid 3D effect scene enables you to experience the imaginary traps and barriers. Now, let's control the heroes and conquer the world by overcoming challenges.

How to play?
Drag the heroes left or right and avoid all obstacles. Do not deviate from track! Come on! Relentless pursuit of super speed. You can be faster along with the music rhythm!

Features:
• One-touch control & simple operation
• Stunning 3D stereo visual
• Rich scenes: massif, cosmos, forest, snowfield, inferno
• A challenge to speed and reflex
